content: The following is a list of **major** [crimes in Singapore](/wiki/Crime_in_Singapore). They are arranged in chronological order. Major crimes such as [murder](/wiki/Murder), [homicide](/wiki/Homicide), [kidnapping](/wiki/Kidnapping), [rape](/wiki/Rape) and [sexual assault](/wiki/Sexual_assault), as well as firearms- and explosive-related crimes, are dealt with by the Major Crime Division of the [Criminal Investigation Department](/wiki/Criminal_Investigation_Department_(Singapore)) of the [Singapore Police Force](/wiki/Singapore_Police_Force). Drug-related crimes such as [drug trafficking](/wiki/Illegal_drug_trade) are handled by the [Central Narcotics Bureau](/wiki/Central_Narcotics_Bureau). White-collar crimes such as [fraud](/wiki/Fraud) and [misappropriation](/wiki/Misappropriation) of finances are handled by the [Commercial Affairs Department](/wiki/Commercial_Affairs_Department) while corruption offences are under the purview of the [Corrupt Practices Investigation Bureau](/wiki/Corrupt_Practices_Investigation_Bureau). Crimes which are of concern to Singapore's national security are dealt with by the [Internal Security Department](/wiki/Internal_Security_Department_(Singapore)) under the [Internal Security Act](/wiki/Internal_Security_Act_(Singapore)) and other relevant laws. ## Timeline - [List of major crimes in Singapore (before 1990)](/wiki/List_of_major_crimes_in_Singapore_(before_1990)) - [List of major crimes in Singapore (1990–1999)](/wiki/List_of_major_crimes_in_Singapore_(1990%E2%80%931999)) - [List of major crimes in Singapore (2000–2009)](/wiki/List_of_major_crimes_in_Singapore_(2000%E2%80%932009)) - [List of major crimes in Singapore (2010–2019)](/wiki/List_of_major_crimes_in_Singapore_(2010%E2%80%932019)) - [List of major crimes in Singapore (2020–present)](/wiki/List_of_major_crimes_in_Singapore_(2020%E2%80%93present)) Index of articles associated with the same nameThis set index article includes a list of related items that share the same name (or similar names).
title: List of major crimes in Singapore
